Sync._AdminApiUrlComment: In production, set this to your Cloudflare tunnel URL (e.g., https://your-tunnel.trycloudflare.com/api)
Sync._SyncIntervalComment: How often to sync releases from Admin.Api (in minutes). With webhooks, this serves as a fallback if webhook delivery fails.

Webhooks._SecretComment: Shared secret for HMAC signature verification. Must match the secret configured in Admin.Api for this client.
